description: Try our easy to follow Orange And Honey Baked Chicken Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Orange And Honey Baked Chicken Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C fan-forced. Line a tray with baking paper.
Place orange zest and juice, honey, soy sauce, garlic and ginger in a small saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring, for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Set aside to cool.
Place chicken drumsticks in a bowl with cooled orange and honey sauce, sesame oil and white pepper. Stir to coat.
Lay drumsticks in a single layer on lined baking tray and cook for 40 minutes, turning once half way through, until golden and sticky. Serve sprinkled with sesame seeds.
